# init()

**Initializer**

Creates an empty operating system version.

## Declaration

```swift
init()
```

## Discussion

After initialization, the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/OperatingSystemVersion/majorVersion], [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/OperatingSystemVersion/minorVersion], and [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/OperatingSystemVersion/patchVersion] are all `0`.

## Creating an Operating System Version

- **init(majorVersion:minorVersion:patchVersion:)**: Creates an operating system version with the provided values.
